COMMENT_TX: replay,8,morrl001,TBA,millb901,NYC21,O,Y,U,,H $Logan Morrison's fly to right-center went into the first row of seats and caromed off a fan's glove back onto the field; the ball was ruled in play and Morrison reached 3B; crew chief Bill Miller requested a review, which overturned the call to a home run
